msbt.message: Big day today, kiddo! I been bouncin' off the walls since dawn, which ain't exactly normal for me. But it's not every day you get to eat food from a big-time chef-type guy. My belly is ready, !

It's finally Turkey Day! I been lookin' forward to this 'cause of all the fancy food we'll be munchin' on. It's also a good day to chat with friends Gurrgle Huh, guess my stomach is ready to talk already!

You know how folks all wanna cook on Turkey Day, but lots of 'em are no good at it? Well, I got a plan. I'm gonna get a bite of somethin' tasty, then cook with it in my mouth to help me! Clever, right?
